name: pp-max
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases a selected move’s max PP to 1.6× its original max PP. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 60%.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A medicine that can optimally raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A medicine that can optimally raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A medicine that optimally raises the maximum PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
